title: Starry Night
location: Museum of Modern Art, New York
description: One of Van Gogh's most famous works, depicting a swirling night sky over a quiet town.

title: Mona Lisa
description: A portrait of a woman with an enigmatic expression, widely considered one of the greatest works of art.

title: The Persistence of Memory
location: Museum of Modern Art, New York
description: Dalí's iconic painting of melting clocks, symbolizing the fluidity of time.

title: The Scream
medium: Oil, tempera, and pastel on cardboard
description: A haunting depiction of existential angst, featuring a figure with an agonized expression.

title: Guernica
description: A powerful anti-war painting, portraying the horrors of the bombing of Guernica during the Spanish Civil War.

title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
description: A beautiful portrayal of a young girl wearing a pearl earring, often referred to as the 'Mona Lisa of the North'.

title: The Last Supper
location: Convent of Santa Maria delle Grazie, Milan
description: A masterful depiction of the moment Jesus announces that one of his apostles will betray him.

title: The Birth of Venus
description: A depiction of the goddess Venus emerging from the sea on a shell, symbolizing beauty and love.

title: The Kiss
medium: Oil and gold leaf on canvas
description: A famous painting representing love and intimacy, featuring a couple locked in a passionate embrace.

title: American Gothic
description: An iconic portrayal of a farmer and his daughter, symbolizing the spirit of rural America.

title: The Night Watch
description: A famous group portrait of a city militia, known for its dramatic use of light and shadow.

title: The School of Athens
description: A grand depiction of classical philosophers and scholars, symbolizing the unity of human knowledge.

title: Liberty Leading the People
description: A powerful symbol of revolution, depicting Liberty personified leading the people to freedom.

title: The Garden of Earthly Delights
description: A triptych depicting the Garden of Eden, earthly pleasures, and hell, full of fantastical imagery and symbolism.
